ccre.igneous

Class IgneousCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.igneous.IgneousCore
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleCore

    public abstract class IgneousCore
extends java.lang.Object
    A Core class for Igneous. Extend this (or SimpleCore, which is easier) in order to write an application to run on the robot.
    See Also:
    SimpleCore

      • createRobotControl

        protected abstract void createRobotControl()
        Implement this method - it should set up everything that your robot needs to do.

      • makeSimpleJoystick

        protected final ISimpleJoystick makeSimpleJoystick(int id)
        Get an ISimpleJoystick for the specified joystick ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the joystick ID, from 1 to 4, inclusive.
        Returns:
        the ISimpleJoystick.
        See Also:
        makeDispatchJoystick(int)

      • makeDispatchJoystick

        protected final IDispatchJoystick makeDispatchJoystick(int id)
        Get an IDispatchJoystick for the specified joystick ID. The joystick will update the inputs and events during teleop mode only. This is equivalent to makeDispatchJoystick(id, duringTeleop).
        Parameters:
        id - the joystick ID, from 1 to 4, inclusive.
        Returns:
        the IDispatchJoystick.
        See Also:
        makeSimpleJoystick(int), makeDispatchJoystick(int, ccre.event.EventSource)

      • makeDispatchJoystick

        protected final IDispatchJoystick makeDispatchJoystick(int id,
                                     EventSource source)
        Get an IDispatchJoystick for the specified joystick ID. The joystick will update the inputs and events when the specified event is fired.
        Parameters:
        id - the joystick ID, from 1 to 4, inclusive.
        source - when to update the joystick.
        Returns:
        the IDispatchJoystick.
        See Also:
        makeSimpleJoystick(int), makeDispatchJoystick(int)

      • makeJaguarMotor

        protected final FloatOutput makeJaguarMotor(int id,
                          boolean negate)
        Create a reference to a Jaguar speed controller on the specified ID and motor reversal.
        Parameters:
        id - the motor port ID, from 1 to 10, inclusive.
        negate - MOTOR_FORWARD if the motor should be unmodified, MOTOR_REVERSE if the motor should be reversed.
        Returns:
        the output that will output to the specified motor.
        See Also:
        MOTOR_FORWARD, MOTOR_REVERSE

      • makeVictorMotor

        protected final FloatOutput makeVictorMotor(int id,
                          boolean negate)
        Create a reference to a Victor speed controller on the specified ID and motor reversal.
        Parameters:
        id - the motor port ID, from 1 to 10, inclusive.
        negate - MOTOR_FORWARD if the motor should be unmodified, MOTOR_REVERSE if the motor should be reversed.
        Returns:
        the output that will output to the specified motor.
        See Also:
        MOTOR_FORWARD, MOTOR_REVERSE

      • makeTalonMotor

                         boolean negate)
        Create a reference to a Talon speed controller on the specified ID and motor reversal.
        Parameters:
        id - the motor port ID, from 1 to 10, inclusive.
        negate - MOTOR_FORWARD if the motor should be unmodified, MOTOR_REVERSE if the motor should be reversed.
        Returns:
        the output that will output to the specified motor.
        See Also:
        MOTOR_FORWARD, MOTOR_REVERSE

        Returns:

      • makeAnalogInput

        protected final FloatInputPoll makeAnalogInput(int id,
                             int averageBits)
        Create a reference to an analog input on the specified port with the specified number of average bits.
        Parameters:
        id - the port number.
        averageBits - the number of averaging bits.
        Returns:
        the analog input, reporting in voltage.

      • makeAnalogInput_ValueBased

        protected final FloatInputPoll makeAnalogInput_ValueBased(int id,
                                        int averageBits)
        Create a reference to an analog input's raw value on the specified port with the specified number of average bits.
        Parameters:
        id - the port number.
        averageBits - the number of averaging bits.
        Returns:
        the analog input, reporting in uncalibrated units.

      • makeServo

        protected final FloatOutput makeServo(int id,
                    float minInput,
                    float maxInput)
        Create a reference to a servo controller for the specified port and minimum and maximum values.
        Parameters:
        id - the port number.
        minInput - the value on the output that should correspond to the servo's minimum position.
        maxInput - the value on the output that should correspond to the servo's maximum position.
        Returns:
        the FloatOutput that controls the servo.

      • makeDSFloatReadout

        protected final FloatOutput makeDSFloatReadout(java.lang.String prefix,
                             int line)
        Create an output that will display the current value on the driver station's LCD.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix, or label, of the output. this is prepended to the value.
        line - the line to display the value on, from 1 to 6.
        Returns:
        the output that will write to the LCD.

      • makeDSFloatReadout

        protected final void makeDSFloatReadout(java.lang.String prefix,
                      int line,
                      FloatInputPoll value,
                      EventSource when)
        Display the current value of the specified FloatInputPoll on the driver station's LCD, whenever the specified event is triggered.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix, or label, of the output. this is prepended to the value.
        line - the line to display the value on, from 1 to 6.
        value - the value to display.
        when - when to update the output.

        the input.

      • useCompressor

        protected final void useCompressor(int pressureSwitchChannel,
                 int compressorRelayChannel)
        Activate the compressor on the given pressure switch channel and compressor relay channel.
        Parameters:
        pressureSwitchChannel - the channel of the pressure switch digital input.
        compressorRelayChannel - the channel of the compressor's relay.

      • useCustomCompressor

        protected final void useCustomCompressor(BooleanInputPoll shouldDisable,
                       int compressorRelayChannel)
        Activate the compressor on the given pressure switch input and compressor relay channel.
        Parameters:
        shouldDisable - should the compressor be turned off.
        compressorRelayChannel - the channel of the compressor's relay.
